key_risks: Profitability challenges with consistent net losses
Dependence on small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in a volatile economic environment
Highly competitive landscape with major players like Square and Clover
Legal risks from lawsuits and investigations into securities violations
controversies: Introduction of a 99-cent 'processing fee' on online orders, leading to customer and restaurant owner backlash
Allegations of misappropriation of trade secrets and breaches of confidentiality agreements
Investigation into potential securities violations related to IPO and financial disclosures
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction with pricing structure and perceived 'triple-dipping' fees
Reliance on SMBs, which are vulnerable to economic downturns and labor shortages
governance_issues: High stock-based compensation expenses impacting financial performance
Legal and regulatory risks from ongoing lawsuits and investigations
